title: AndiHealth
subtitle: Bilingual fitness booking platform on the edge
description: A bilingual website and appointment booking system for a medical fitness instructor, built on Cloudflare Workers with Hono and D1 — zero external dependencies, fully server-rendered.

content.overview: AndiHealth is a bilingual (Hungarian/English) website and online booking platform for a certified medical fitness and Pilates instructor based in Esztergom, Hungary. The site serves as both a public-facing presence and a full appointment management system — from session scheduling and client bookings to pass management and admin controls.
content.challenge: The client needed a fast, reliable, and cost-effective platform that could handle bilingual content, real-time session availability, an online booking flow, and an admin panel — all without the overhead of traditional hosting or complex frameworks.
content.solution: We built the entire application on Cloudflare's edge platform using Hono for server-side rendered JSX, D1 (SQLite) for the database, and Tailwind CSS via CDN for styling. The result is a zero-dependency, globally fast application running entirely on the Cloudflare free tier with no client-side JavaScript frameworks.

features.title: Online session booking
features.description: Clients can browse available group sessions by date, book spots, and receive confirmations — all without authentication

features.title: Bilingual HU/EN support
features.description: Full Hungarian and English content with automatic locale routing and SEO-optimized alternate links

features.title: Admin panel
features.description: Password-protected dashboard to manage sessions, cancellations, clients, passes, and view booking overviews

features.title: Pass & credit system
features.description: Multi-session pass management with automatic credit deduction and expiry tracking
